docs.snippet: The Citadel military college in South Carolina said on Thursday it was suspending eight cadets after photographs were posted on social media showing them wearing pointed white pillowcases that resemble hoods worn by the Ku Klux Klan, a white supre...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Citadel military college in South Carolina said on Thursday it was suspending eight cadets after photographs were posted on social media showing them wearing pointed white pillowcases that resemble hoods worn by the Ku Klux Klan, a white supremacist group.

headline.main: South Carolina Military College Suspends Cadets Over KKK-Like Hoods
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Military College Suspends Cadets Over KKK-Like Hoods
